mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REQUEST_COMMENT WHERE REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo} AND REQUEST_COMMENT_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REQUEST_COMMENT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST_COMMENT ( REQUEST_COMMENT_NO, REQUEST_NO, MEMBER_ID, REQUEST_COMMENT_CONTENT) VALUES ( SEQ_REQUEST_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{requestNo}, #{memberId}, #{requestCommentContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST_COMMENT SET REQUEST_COMMENT_YN = 'N' WHERE REQUEST_COMMENT_NO = #{requestCommentNo}
